episode: I felt lonely when my wife went to Iceland for two weeks several months ago

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I felt lonely when my wife went to Iceland for two weeks several months ago

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That must have been tough. Did you find anything to help pass the time?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I tried to keep busy working out and cleaning the house

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Sounds like a productive way to cope. Did it help?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: A little bit. But the nights were still very lonely'

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sorry to hear that. Nights can be the hardest.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes. that is when the bad thoughts always seem to creep in

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I get that. Nights can be tough.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes. It can get lonely for sure

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Yeah, it's rough.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yes I agree

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was so glad when she got home

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I bet! Must have been such a relief.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yes it was. I love her so much

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's sweet! Love is the best.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It is. She is such a wonderful person

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's awesome! She sounds amazing.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: she is. She is my world

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's beautiful! You're lucky to have each other.
